definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Mastic is the recommended adhesive for gluing indoor mosaic tiles.
sentences.chinese: 乳香是室內馬賽克瓷磚粘合膠建議。

sentences.english: The gifts; there are three gifts: gold,frankincense and myrrh.
sentences.chinese: 他們贈送給耶穌黃金，乳香和沒藥。

sentences.english: They are frankincense and myrrh. Both have powerful, pleasant smells.
sentences.chinese: 他們是乳香和沒藥，都具有濃郁的氣味。

sentences.english: Frankincense was a kind of incense, used to worship God in the temple.
sentences.chinese: 乳香是一種香料，在聖殿裏敬拜神的時候使用。

sentences.english: What do I care about incense from Sheba or sweet calamus from a distant land?
sentences.chinese: 從示巴出的乳香，從遠方出的菖蒲奉來給我有何益呢？

sentences.english: In particular, myrrh and frankincense are the most commonly used.
sentences.chinese: 特別是，沒藥和乳香是最常用的。

sentences.english: Mastic and Thinset are the recommended adhesives for gluing mosaic tiles.
sentences.chinese: 乳香和Thinset是馬賽克瓷磚膠粘合劑的建議。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish an RP-HPLC method for determination of strychnine in Ruxiang Shangjin liniment.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定乳香傷筋搽劑中士的寧的含量。

sentences.english: So bring Him incense, gold and myrrh, come passant, king, to own Him;
sentences.chinese: 獻上乳香沒藥黃金，衆人當齊來拜祂？

sentences.english: In China frankincense was thought to be a treatment for leprosy.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，乳香被認爲是用作治療麻瘋病。

definition: Styrax officinalis or Styrax benzoin/benzoin resin (used in TCM)/Benzoinum
snowdrop bush (Styrax officinalis)/gum storax, used in TCM
myrrh (Commiphora myrrha)/also written 沒藥|没药
nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
